text: Tharoa niyo a: "Piyaratiyaya mi so Allah, go so (Qor´an a) initoron rkami, go so initoron ko Ibrahim, go so Ismail, go so Is´haq, go so Ya´qob, go so manga moriyataw niyan, go so inibgay ko Mosa, go so Eysa, go so inibgay ko manga nabi a phoon ko Kadnan iran: da a zalboon ami kiran a isa bo: Go skami na Ron kami mbabayorantang
